pullrequest.title: Fix compilation using gcc8 and add support for c++17

content.raw:
I had to update the `update-alternatives` line to create a symlink to gcov-8. The coverage output from gcc8 has changed, and requires a newer lcov. Pipelines now installs lcov from source. 

The bash script from [codecov.io](http://codecov.io) doesn’t seem to like the new coverage output. I’ve disabled [codecov.io](http://codecov.io) in pipelines.
